isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Service Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Cylinder Head and Valve Train - Inspection - Pressure Check Cylinder Head

svcproc.title: Pressure Check Cylinder Head
svcproc.para: Pressure testing the cylinder head will reveal cracks in ports or sleeve leakage which cannot be observed using dye penetrant. Pressure-test the cylinder head as follows:

step1.para:
Install fuel injectors into cylinder head injector bores and secure. Refer to Fuel Injectors
for installation procedure.
Remove the valves, using a valve spring compressor. See "Reconditioning" in this section for valve removal instructions.
Pressure test the cylinder head using the cylinder head pressure test tools.

calloutgroup.callout1: Cylinder head test plate (bolts not shown)
Thermostat opening pressure adapter- cylinder head

step1.para: Fasten the pressure plate to the cylinder head gasket surface using the 24 mounting bolts and nuts supplied with the kit.
Remove thermostat and install air regulator. Secure to cylinder head with two mounting bolts.
Remove the pipe plug next to the thermostat opening. Fill cylinder head with hot water and reinstall pipe plug
Install a hose fitting to the cylinder head at the removed plug. Apply 124-138 kPa (18-20 psi) air pressure and inspect for leaks at the:

svcproc.para: If leakage is observed at any port or the upper and lower deck, replace the cylinder head.
